Package picross

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
picross.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Since:
2021-09-15
Version:
1.1 GameController is responsible for handling action events and any game logic which includes the menu options.
Author:
Neil Kingdom

      public GameController(GameModel gameModel, GameView gameView)
      Parameters:
      gameModel - Instance of GameModel class
      gameView - Instance of GameView class Parameterized constructor. Takes in a GameModel object and a GameView object in order to access public methods from each class.

  • Method Details

    • initBoard

      public void initBoard()
      Parameters:
      gameView - Used for creating the main JFrame Essentially starts the actual game by calling pack() and setVisible() of GameView's inherited JFrame
      Since:
      2021-09-15

    • setTimer

      public void setTimer()
      Since:
      2021-09-15 Begins a timer that repeats every second. The timer will update the timer field in the game, as well as refresh the screen.

    • rescaleBoard

      public void rescaleBoard(int newDimension, boolean genNewConfig)
      Parameters:
      newDimension - The new dimension of the board.
      genNewConfig - Boolean that decides if a random layout should be generated upon rescaling. The name of this function is slightly decieving. It is used for rescaling the board to newDimension, however, it is also used for resetting the game by passing in the same dimension and putting genNewConfig as false.
      Since:
      2021-11-12

    • showSolution

      public void showSolution()
      Since:
      2021-11-12 Displays the solution for the current board.

    • exitGame

      public void exitGame()
      Since:
      2021-11-12 Prompts the user with a menu asking if they're sure they want to quit. If so, the game is closed, otherwise, it is resumed.

    • colorChooser

      public void colorChooser()
      Since:
      2021-11-12 Prompts the user with a color swatch for picking a new color palette from the default.

    • about

      public void about()
      Since:
      2021-11-13 Prompts the user with an about menu with basic information about the game.

    • addMenuItemListener

      public void addMenuItemListener(JMenuItem menuItem, GameController.Functions funcEnum, int newDimension)
      Parameters:
      menuItem - JMenuItem to add action listener to.
      funcEnum - An enum which determines which menu function to call
      newDimension - Only used for the scale board enum. New dimension to scale the board to. Adds action listener to a JMenuItem component
      Since:
      2021-10-09

    • outputEvent

      public void outputEvent(String text, Color textColor)
      Parameters:
      text - Text to be appended to rightTextPane
      textColor - The color of the text that will be output. This method is used for logging events that occur within the game. Most action listeners invoke this method with event messages.
      Since:
      2021-10-09
